comment.author: 36083067@N04
comment._content: I don't think this is at a wharf; looks like a dry dock to me, although cannot pick where - Wellington did not have one, I suspect

comment.author: 76323911@N04
comment._content: This was taken in Calliope Graving Dock Auckland. There were only ever 2 Graving docks in NZ. One in Lyttelton and one in Auckland.  Wellington had NZ's only floating dock.

comment.author: 78374595@N06
comment._content:
There was a dry dock at Port Chalmers until it was filled in to make way for the container port
in the 1970's.
